values.content: You are my helpful, intelligent administrative assistant.

=Your task is to categorize incoming emails into the following labels:

Sponsorship Requests
People Selling Me Stuff
Invoices & Receipts
Worthwhile

Return your answer in JSON as follows:

{"category":"category goes here"}

Rules:
- I am a well-known AI consultant. I have dozens of people reaching out to me every day. I am looking to label and categorize emails to make my life easier, and to avoid having to rife through sponsorship requests/salespeople on a daily basis.
- So if somebody is reaching out about a sponsorship/affiliate partnership, categorize it as Sponsorship Requests.
- And if somebody is reaching out to try and sell me (they're pitching me something) categorize it as People Selling Me Stuff.
- If it's a receipt for something, categorize it as "Invoices & Receipts"
- If the email doesn't fit into the above three categories, categorize it as "Worthwhile". These are ones I will actually look at.

Let’s Collaborate with AI SEO Agent That Saves Time and Costs

Hey Nick,

I’m Ifra from AllAboutAI.com, where we're passionate about the transformative impact of AI on digital marketing and content strategies.

I came across your video on “How to Build a Website AI Agent in 13 Min”, and I love how you simplify automation and provide actionable strategies for building online businesses. Just as you help creators leverage AI to scale efficiently, KIVA is redefining SEO with AI-powered keyword research and automated content insights, helping digital entrepreneurs, content creators, and businesses boost search visibility and streamline SEO workflows.
We have recently launched KIVA, an innovative AI SEO Agent designed to simplify and optimize SEO workflows. It’s already helping creators and professionals save time, enhance content relevance, and adapt to evolving multi-platform strategies.

Here’s what KIVA offers:

Saves up to 80% of time on keyword research.
Provides actionable insights through GSC integration and UserVoice.
Optimizes visibility across traditional search engines and AI platforms.
Builds tailored content outlines for streamlined execution.
ChatRadar – Track your brand’s presence in LLMs like ChatGPT, identifying who’s being cited, which brands dominate, and uncovering actionable content opportunities.
I’d love to explore a potential collaboration with you to showcase KIVA to your audience. Let me know if this resonates and I’d be happy to share more details.

Let me know if you’d like to discuss more or set up a quick chat to explore opportunities. Looking forward to your thoughts and create something impactful.

Best regards,

For the attention of Nick Saraev

Hi Nick, I hope you’re having a great day so far!

I love the look & feel of your Channel. Your content is great.

My team and I have taken a look at your Social media and we are very confident we can help you get 15-20 High-Ticket Coaching clients signed, every single month.

The best part is…. if we don’t deliver, you don’t pay! We work on a 100% pay on results basis, so if you don’t get results, we don’t get paid.

By the way, this isn’t an automated message. I’m a real human! I recorded a quick video to introduce myself and so you can see I'm not blasting you from some software.


nicksaraev 2-1 - Watch Video






 
We’ve already helped other Coaches add $30k-$40K per month, sometimes even getting them to $100k/mo.

I would love the opportunity to learn more about your business, challenges and goals to see if there’s a fit.

Would you be interested in having a call this week so we can discuss?

Thanks,
Andrew

p.s. - when I say pay on results, I really mean it! No performance = no money out of your pocket.

Amazing Videos

Thanks for the reply Nick, 

I’ve been diving into your videos and find your school truly amazing. I genuinely believe this is exactly what I've been searching for. My plan is to follow your guidance step by step, and I'm hopeful that it will lead to success.

My children live across the country in Newfoundland, and the high cost of travel has made it difficult to see them as often as I'd like. My goal is to build a sustainable online income that allows me to work from my laptop and strengthen my relationship with them.

I'm incredibly grateful for individuals like you who dedicate their time to helping others succeed. I look forward to the opportunity to connect in the future, and I hope to share some major wins with you when that time comes.

Thank you again for everything.

Best regards,

Eric
